trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oculta todos os itens que estão no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>.
